Course options include: Contemporary Art and Critical Pedagogy: Identity, Representation & Multiculturalism Special Education, Disabilities Studies and Contemporary Art Media Literacy and Art in the Classroom Course descriptions    Seniors who choose this option and apply for admission to the MA program by the February 1 deadline may also be eligible for a special scholarship for BFA graduates, covering 30% of their graduate tuition.
